name: bidens cernua
description: The bright, sunflower-like yellow blossoms of Bidens cernua grace full-sun wet sites in the summer months and September. The fruiting heads tend to nod.  Nodding Bur Marigold is an annual; it completes its life cycle during one season but will re-seed.  Sticktights (see detailed seed picture) are the bur-like seeds of some Bidens species, so named because they stick to clothing, shoestrings, etc.    Other common names in use: Nodding Beggar's Tick, Bur Marigold and Sticktight.
